j.r.r. tolkien

bienvenidos!

My name is Mae, and I'm a senior studying neuroscience, computer science, and languages at UNC Chapel Hill. I am known as a Jane of all trades, and now I'm searching for ways to turn my talents and passion for helping others into a career.

about me

"In every job that must be done, there is an element of fun. Find the fun, and snap! The job's a game."

Mary Poppins has been right all along. In every task, every puzzle, there is always a way to be creative and turn a chore into fun. As a nineteen year old graduating college with over two and a half years of research experience and an array of skills, I strive to exceed expectations in everything I do. But what's all that work for if you're not enjoying any of it?

Currently I'm pursuing a BS in Neuroscience with a BA in Computer Science, and throughout my college journey I have also studied many languages, most recently Chinese. I make this pursuit fun by thinking outside the box, which means trying everything from programming an interactive presentation for neuroscience to stocking my kitchen with chopsticks to learn more about Chinese culture. I give my all to whatever I'm working on, to the point where it doesn't feel like working! Right now I'm looking for a creative, driven team to join after I graduate and the next puzzle for me to solve.
